comment.body: I clone a zeroblog but don't have any connect. what can I do?

> [nofish](#comment_165_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Probably because noone visited your site. Try posting it to ZeroMe or 0list site with some description of your content.

I use another computer tried, can't connect it. because don't have any node even can't publish it.

> [nofish](#comment_166_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Probably then you don't have opened port or tor available on both of the machines.

yes, I didn't open port, because other site have many connect. I try it. thank you. but open port many people don't know how to do in China, are there any simple way?

> [nofish](#comment_167_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Running Tor on both client should also work.

ok, thank you!
